title: S3 to EventBridge
description: Creates an S3 bucket that publishes events to EventBridge.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The SAM template deploys an S3 bucket that publishes events to Amazon EventBridge, and sets up a Lambda function to show how to consume these events via an EventBridge rule. It deploys the the IAM resources required to run the application.
EventBridge consumes events directly from S3 buckets when the NoticationConfiguration is enabled, as shown in the template.
